mapper.select: SELECT DATE(created_at) AS date, COUNT(user_id) AS count FROM user GROUP BY DATE(created_at) ORDER BY DATE(created_at) ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - (birth DIV 10000)) < 20 THEN 'Under 20' WHEN (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - (birth DIV 10000)) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20-29' WHEN (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - (birth DIV 10000)) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30-39' WHEN (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - (birth DIV 10000)) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40-49' ELSE '50+' END AS ageGroup, COUNT(user_id) AS count FROM user GROUP BY ageGroup
SELECT gender, COUNT(user_id) AS count FROM user GROUP BY gender ORDER BY gender DESC
